snippet: A former top Deutsche Bank deal maker sued the city of Los Angeles and two of its police officers on Wednesday, accusing the men of beating him and smearing his reputation in a widely publicized arrest last year.
abstract: A former top Deutsche Bank deal maker sued the city of Los Angeles and two of its police officers on Wednesday, accusing the men of beating him and smearing his reputation in a widely publicized arrest last year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and MICHAEL CIEPLY

headline.main: Former Top Media Banker Sues Los Angeles and 2 Police Officers
